text: CREATE TABLE ORDERITEMS (Order# NUMBER(4), Item# NUMBER(2), ISBN VARCHARZ(10), Quant ity NMBERCS) NoT NULL, FaidEach NUMBERCS,2) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT order itens_order#itemÃ©_pk PRIMARY KEY Corders, items), CONSTRAINT order iteins_order#_fk FOREIGN KEY (order#) REFERENCES orders Corders) , CONSTRAINT orderitems_ishi_fk FOREIGN Kev (isbn) REFERENCES books (isbn) , CONSTRAINT odleriems_quartity_ck CHECK (quantity > 0) J;
